# NSCollectionView.DropOperation.on

**Case**

The drop occurs at the collection view item to which the item was dragged.

## Declaration

```swift
case on
```

## Constants

- **NSCollectionView.DropOperation.before**: The drop occurs before the collection view item to which the item was dragged.

items.description: The drop occurs before the collection view item to which the item was dragged.
items.name: NSCollectionView.DropOperation.before
